<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #10443 (Add fee_est tool for debugging fee estimation code by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Tested ACK fa6b4b5. Verified all OP claims.

`CalculateMemPoolAncestors` is called in:
 https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/ef4fac0ea5b4891f4529e4b59dfd1f7aeb3009b5/src/miner.h#L173
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/ef4fac0ea5b4891f4529e4b59dfd1f7aeb3009b5/src/policy/rbf.h#L26
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/ef4fac0ea5b4891f4529e4b59dfd1f7aeb3009b5/src/txmempool.h#L680
nit: could move to 65 since `removeRecursive` locks separately
